name: SuperBridge
0:
”Alexa, Turn on kitchen lights.”
”Alexa, Set the table lights to 50%.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Super Bridge skill for Amazon Alexa offers excellent real-time connections between devices in your FIBARO smart home controller with google home. It syncs all the devices from the smart-home controller and populates it in Alexa, and can be controlled by the Alexa app or Alexa Voice. Just log in to your Super Bridge skill and see it in action.

You can now rapidly control your FIBARO z-wave controller. 
Ask Alexa to control your lights, switches, smart plugs, blinds and Scenes configured with Super Bridge. 

Beginning 

1. To add the SuperBridge Skill to Alexa go to the Alexa mobile application. Under Skills, scan for "Super Bridge", Select "Super Bridge" and tap "Enable". 
2. You will be prompted to sign in and verify your Super Bridge account to Alexa. 
3. At long last, tap "done" and afterwards tap "DISCOVER DEVICES" or ask Alexa to "DISCOVER Devices". This can take as long as 40 seconds. 

You can turn devices on/off, for instance: "Alexa, turn on my room lights" or "Alexa, turn off the kitchen lights". 
You can change the brightness, for instance: "Alexa, light up Living Room to 50%". 
You can raise and lower your blinds, for instance: "Alexa, open "the Lounge Blinds, or "Alexa, close the Bedroom Blinds". 

Supported Devices : 

* Switches 
* Lights (Dimmers and RGBW) 
* Blinds
